forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 19C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 66F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 66F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 18C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 19C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 67F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 62F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
